channel.title: Need Help Badly Please!
channel.description:
ok first off i got everything i need but when i got to press compile it says this:
'"c:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\"' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
What does it say that? and also when i press runserver. it says this
'java' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
word for word what it says can anyone please help me? I did the path thingy and the classpath and i also have the no-ip set up and when i open the no-ipDUC i click the server name thingy and it says its online but idk what to do. If anyone can help please post. Thanks.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2008, 04:14:26 pm[/size][hr]ok also i just edited the compile folder and now it says:
The system cannont find the path specified. Press any key to continue.
Should i have changed it becuz first it was "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\" -cp . *.java pause
and now i changed it to "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Should i change it back to the first one or is there something else i need to do

item.title: Need Help Badly Please!
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

ok first off i got everything i need but when i got to press compile it says this:

‘“c:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin”’ is not reconized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

What does it say that? and also when i press runserver. it says this

‘java’ is not reconized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

word for word what it says can anyone please help me? I did the path thingy and the classpath and i also have the no-ip set up and when i open the no-ipDUC i click the server name thingy and it says its online but idk what to do. If anyone can help please post. Thanks.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2008, 04:14:26 pm[/size][hr]ok also i just edited the compile folder and now it says:

The system cannont find the path specified.
Press any key to continue.

Should i have changed it becuz first it was “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin” -cp . *.java
pause

and now i changed it to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Should i change it back to the first one or is there something else i need to do
